property.name: logsearch_dir
property.description: Location where Logsearch will be installed to. If download_location is set to RPM, logsearch will be downloaded to /usr/hdp/_version_/logsearch

property.name: logsearch_download_location
property.description: Location to download Logsearch from. If set to RPM, it will install from rpm. Otherwise will download from tar.gaz (e.g. https://s3.amazonaws.com/publicrepo/logsearch-portal.tar.gz)

property.name: logsearch_collection_numshards
property.description: Number of shards for Solr collections

property.name: logsearch_service_logs_max_retention
property.description: Days to retain the logs in Solr
